def generate_matrix(N, M):
    ans = []
    if N != M:
        r = 1
        for i in range(N):
            mat = []
            c = r + 1
            ele = r
            for j in range(M):
                mat.append(ele)
                ele += r
            r += 2
            ans.append(mat)
    elif N < M:
        r = 0
        dif = N + 1
        ele = 1
        for i in range(1, N + 1):
            mat = []
            r = i
            for j in range(M):
                mat.append(ele)
                ele += r
            strt = mat[0]
            ele = strt + dif
            ans.append(mat)
    else:
        ele = 1
        for i in range(1, N + 1):
            mat = []
            dif = M + i
            for j in range(M):
                mat.append(ele)
                ele += dif
            strt = mat[0]
            ele = strt + 1
            ans.append(mat)
    return ans
